definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Financial college students' quality education has its special inner regularity.
sentences.chinese: 財經類專業大學生的素質教育有其獨特的內在規律性。

sentences.english: In addition, peasants are the leading part in building up the new countryside.
sentences.chinese: 農民大學生更是新農村建設的領頭雁。

sentences.english: He has always been of the opinion that university students ought to have a wider range of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 他一向主張大學生的知識面要寬一些。

sentences.english: Objective To study the structure of the scale of college students gratitude .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討大學生感戴量表的因素結構。

sentences.english: These projects showed the wisdom and innovativeness of the participating students.
sentences.chinese: 這些資助項目反映出大學生們的智慧和創造力。

sentences.english: So every year an increasing number of college stu dents take the post-graduate entrance examination.
sentences.chinese: 因此，每年有越來越多的大學生參加研究生入學考試。

sentences.english: New facilities will include the Universiade City and a marine sports base.
sentences.chinese: 需要新建的包括大學生體育城以及海上運動基地。

sentences.english: To undergraduates, the relationship between the discipline-matching and the academic performance is positive correlation.
sentences.chinese: 大學生的專業匹配性與學業成績呈顯著的正相關。

sentences.english: So apparently there's this area where all like the sororities are
sentences.chinese: 所以這個區域是很多女大學生聯誼會聚集的地方。

sentences.english: There are already 1.96 million university students in Britain and 1.2 million higher education students, according to the Department for Innovation, Universities and Skills.
sentences.chinese: 在英國，現在有196萬大學生和120萬研究生。

sentences.english: Zhao Jing Tao, a college student in China, thought of an old saying.
sentences.chinese: 一位中國大學生趙景濤想起了一句古語。

sentences.english: University student Kicked Out OfSchoolFor Censuring Foreign LanguageEducation?
sentences.chinese: 炮轟外語教育大學生被開除？

sentences.english: A university is obligated to foster all-rounded and high-quality students.
sentences.chinese: 一個大學的責任，是全面地提高大學生的品質。

sentences.english: There's less than two weeks to go until the start of the Shenzhen Universiade.
sentences.chinese: 距離深圳世界大學生運動會開始還有不到兩週的時間。

sentences.english: You know college kids and their drunken exhibitionism.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，大學生和他們的酒後暴露。

sentences.english: Now the country doesnot gurantee college students work.Will it does good or harm to us?
sentences.chinese: 現在大學生國家也不包分配了，究竟是好還是壞呢？

definition: specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
